mapper.sql: id, nickname, province_id, city_id, county_id, area, address, pot_x, pot_y, letter, description, status, start_time, end_time, ctime, ltime, cuid, luid
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into hl_house ( id, nickname, province_id, city_id, county_id, area, address, pot_x, pot_y, letter, description, status, start_time, end_time, ctime, ltime, cuid, luid ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{potX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{potY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{letter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{luid,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into hl_house${substationNameSpell}
id,
nickname,
province_id,
city_id,
county_id,
area,
address,
pot_x,

description,
status,

mapper.update:
update hl_house${substationNameSpell}
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pot_x = #{potX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pot_y = #{potY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
letter = #{letter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cuid = #{cuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
luid = #{luid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hl_house${substationNameSpell} set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pot_x = #{potX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pot_y = #{potY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, letter = #{letter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cuid = #{cuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, luid = #{luid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from hl_house${substationNameSpell} where id IN (${ids})
mapper.select: select hsb.spell from hl_substation hsb where hsb.wechat_official_accounts_id = #{publicnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select hhb.id houseId ,hhb.nickname houseName from hl_house_${allSpell} hhb where hhb.county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from hl_house${substationNameSpell} where id = #{id} and status = 1
select count(1) from hl_house${substationNameSpell} t where 1=1

SELECT t.id, t.nickname, t.province_id, t.city_id, t.county_id, t.area, t.address, t.pot_x, pot_y, t.letter, t.description, t.status, date_format(t.start_time, '1971-01-01 %H:%i:%s')startTime, date_format(t.end_time, '1971-01-01 %H:%i:%s')endTime, t.ctime, t.ltime, t.cuid, t.luid, p.`name` AS province, c.`name` AS city, cn.`name` AS county, cu.username AS cuser, lu.username AS luser FROM hl_house${substationNameSpell} t LEFT JOIN map_province p ON t.province_id = p.id LEFT JOIN map_city c ON t.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN map_county cn ON t.county_id = cn.id LEFT JOIN admin_user cu ON t.cuid = cu.id LEFT JOIN admin_user lu ON t.luid = lu.id where 1=1
select hsb.id, hsb.spell from hl_substation hsb where hsb.wechat_official_accounts_id = #{publicnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
